title: ‘Can You Hear Me?’ Scam Warning
subtitle: Dozens of news outlets reported on a purported scam wherein fraudsters supposedly falsify charges by randomly calling people and asking 'Can you hear me?'
author: Kim LaCapria
vclaim: People are being victimized by scammers who call and ask "Can you hear me?" and record the "yes" response in order to use it to authorize fake charges.
